data.name: Veneficium
data.detailed_description:
Being on your guard will become second nature in Veneficium, a survival-horror game developed by a passionate team. Play as Abigail Vandran, a witch who has only one goal in mind: to find her grandmother Willow and escape a forest of death... Only if she survives the wrath of the demons lurking in the mist.

Play as Abigail in her quest to find her grandmother in a cursed forest. Use your spellcasting abilities to hide from various dangers. Will you survive the night?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 64bit
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1060 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible, Headphones highly recommended

content_descriptors.notes: Veneficium features graphic gore content, death and strong language.
